alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 6:26PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 715 PM MST... At 626 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Luke AFB, or over Waddell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Youngtown, Sun City West, Sun City, Waddell, Litchfield Park, Glendale Sports Complex, White Tank Mountain Park, Luke AFB, Beardsley, Downtown Peoria, Surprise Stadium and Arrowhead Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 118 and 129. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 209 and 218. US Highway 60 between mile markers 138 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
